name: SCOUT (NightlySpectre)
description:
You're a scout, you need to find other planets in your galaxy.

CREDITS:

Music: finesounds - UNFA

every other sprite, sound etc is made by NightlySpectre

CONTROLS:

WASD Keys to move.

E To interact

NOTES:

windows version is untested.

TIPS:

the arrow points towards the hub area in case you get lost.

a vendor will appear once you discover 2 planets, he's needed in order to finish the game.
